events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I am not satisfied with the product.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to request for money back related to incorrect shipment.
The case has been assigned to agent Emily R. to handle the refund request promptly and assist the customer further.
Hello, this is Emily from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and I'll help you with your refund today.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund more quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I have attached a photo showing that the item is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and provide a prepaid label for you to return the incorrect item.
That sounds good to me, thank you for the prompt help. I appreciate the quick response and the return label offer.
The refund has been processed and you should see the credit within a few business days. We have also sent the return shipping label to your email.
We are checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there has been no further response, the case is now being closed. Please contact us anytime if you need more assistance.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to your email to help us improve our service quality.
